original_text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.
korean_text: 난리와 난리 소문을 듣겠으나 너희는 삼가 두려워하지 말라 이런 일이 있어야 하되 아직 끝은 아니니라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall hear of wars
see that ye be not troubled
for all these things must come to pass
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일이 반드시 있을 것이나

sentences.original_text: but the end is not yet
